name: Block Fell
description:
Play Block Fell.

NOTE: Click the "Run Game" button above to play the game in full-screen mode.

This is an early release. Follow us on Twitter for updates.

There are four different modes of casual, fun wordplay.

  1. Elimination: rearrange blocks to form words and clear the board
  2. Block Fell: move falling blocks to form words and avoid stacking them too high
  3. Q&A: rearrange blocks to form the answer to the question
  4. Slider: Guess the answer to the clue by sliding blocks up or down.

Block Fell allows you not only to maneuver falling blocks, but you can also slide blocks that have already fallen.

The game also features a "delete" capability ... if a particular block is in your way, hit the garbage can and select that block to remove it from the board. Use this wisely though, you only get one garbage can per level.

This game is in early release, currently in production for a full release on itch and Steam. Follow us on Twitter and here on itch.io for info on upcoming releases. We hope you enjoy Block Fell.
